description: osx_defaults allows users to read, write, and delete Mac OS X user defaults from Ansible

domain.description: The domain is a domain name of the form com.companyname.appname.

state.description: The state of the user defaults

value.description: The value to write. Only required when state = present.

host.description: The host on which the preference should apply. The special value "currentHost" corresponds to the "-currentHost" switch of the defaults commandline tool.

key.description: The key of the user preference

type.description: The type of value to write.

array_add.description: Add new elements to the array for a key which has an array as its value.
